p: Recent studies indicate that environmental sciences are a predominant research topic in the citizen science landscape (Follett and Strezov, 2015; Moczek et al., 2021). However, many of these analyses associate each project with only one main research area (Follett and Strezov, 2015; Lukyanenko et al., 2020), neglecting the multi-disciplinary nature of many projects. In a meso level study, which included a sample of all CS projects listed on the Zooniverse platform (n = 218), we have investigated the multi-disciplinarity nature of projects through an assessment of research areas within a subset of projects in the CS Track database.
